modShortDescription: From a single variant block, you may choose to build many in-game models as replicas! 2 Decoration blocks, 1 for models, 1 for floral! More to come!
modDescription:
From a single variant block, you may choose to build many in-game models as replicas! Many of the replicas also can serve as a container. 2 Decoration blocks, 1 for models, 1 for floral! More to come!

XML only, works Server Side. Works with vanilla settings or with most other mods.

## Changelog

**v1.01:** Update to correct a massive error!

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1473BzsoAItbO7hwumOwuJuegZVXKlZU8/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/22292-riles-deco-blocks/).

**Credits:** [Riles](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/riles/)
